en.bio: Experienced Full-stack Web Developer and Project Manager with a proven track record in managing and delivering complex web projects. Expertise in Vue, Nuxt.JS, React, Node.JS, Python, and various databases. Strong project management skills and customer relations, backed by a Master's in Management Engineering.

it.bio: Esperto Full-stack Web Developer e Project Manager con un curriculum solido nel management e sviluppo di progetti web complessi. Esperti in Vue, Nuxt.JS, React, Node.JS, Python e diverse banche dati. Forti competenze di project management e relazioni con i clienti, supportate da un Master in Ingegneria del Management.
